titleStmt.title: John Boyle to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG14208

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
Dec. 18th 3
To his Excellency,
Tho E. Bramlette,
Governor of Ky.
Executive Office -- Frankfort
Governor.

I have the honor to transmit herewith, for the consideration of the Honorable the General Assembly of Kentucky, and in pursuance of an Act -- approved March 3rd 1863, entitled "An Act to provide for claims against the State contracted under the State Guard Law" an original transcript of proceedings in conformity with that Enactment, exhibiting claims against the State -- still unsatisfied, and the manner of their creation.

Respectfully
Your obt serv't
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen. of Ky.
